storyInfo: Out on the wastes, Lappland finds a wrecked taxi and returns to Nuova Volsinii with Zaaro to join in the fun at Carnevale. On the night of the car accident, she witnesses everything unfold from the roof of a high-rise building—a wonderful show is staged and set.

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We got here too late. They finished their fight and now there's no one alive to talk to.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You stopped our duel just to watch a boring shootout?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Woman and wolf stand on the barrenlands as the sun rises, with a yellow cab parked not far from them.
The cab's hood bears a deep depression from a prior intimate meeting with a boulder. Tire tracks twist and turn in its wake peppered with strewn up dirt, narrating the car's journey here...
Several bodies lie around the car. The wind carries the stench of blood far away, inciting low growls from wild beasts in the distance.
Zaaro, there are two things you ought to understand.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: One: I am not a toy for your entertainment. Two: As my toy for my entertainment, I've realized an immortal Signore dei Lupi is just so boring...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Compared to you, isn't a famiglia shoot out happening in the middle of the wastes much more interesting?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Haha, the car can still move even after all that?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Where was its original destination?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Let's see... a spot circled on the map—'Nuova Volsinii', and some entry documents in the glove box to boot... Looks like we're all set!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: A familiar name.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Hey, Zaaro. Help me drag these corpses aside so I can reverse the car.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You want to...
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Siracusa has graced us with an invitation.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Don't tell me you'd refuse? I didn't think a Signore dei Lupi would be so rude.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I told you, I will walk with you until the victor is decided.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Then help me out!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Salve.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Um, y-you don't have to be so formal, Signor Capone.
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Relax. I just didn't wanna spook you with this scary mug of mine. After all, it wasn't easy to secure this meet-up with you.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I thought a lot about your proposal. If city hall staff discover I privately transferred my citizen points to you, will they...
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Just pick a few documents from your pile of certs, write a little explanation, and change the name on 'em. Simple.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I'll earn fifty points, while you get... a lotta dough.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: We ain't violatin' no laws here. If city hall got a problem, it just means the New Urban Management Act needs more revisions. I bet you know this better than me.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: When you put it like that...
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Identity registration's awful unfair, ain't it?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I turned over a new leaf, paid so much guarantee money the past six months and did so much community service all thanks to my criminal record. All that work, and I still haven't earned even half of the 120 points I need...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But you? A 'clean resume', and 'experience in law-adjacent tech industries'... You're pretty new here, but the points you converted from all that's already enough to become a citizen three times over!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It'd be a waste to keep 'em for yourself.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: A-Alright.
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: I applied for an appointment next week to get my documents authenticated. I'll get these revisions done before that—
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Easy, pal.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Huh? Aren't you the one wanting to become a citizen ASAP?
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: What I mean is, have you ever thought of puttin' off your citizenship application?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Wh-What do you mean?
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Lots of us guys in the city could use a lot more points, but there ain't many guys like you who can get 'em so easy. So...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I'm happy to play middleman.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii introduced the New Urban Management Act to deter people like you—S-Sorry...
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: I mean, aren't we contradicting the city's founding principles by doing this?
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: C'mon, pal. Relax, relaaax. I was just thinkin' out loud, is all. Don't mind me.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But noodle on it a bit. Why'd you come here? A stable income? A better life?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You think you'll get that after you become a legal citizen of Nuova Volsinii and work an entry-level job at a law firm?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: (Claps)
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Are you going to stay here and watch them all night, Lappland?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Why the rush? How can we start our night shift before getting some food? Want a slice of this freshly baked polenta?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: On second thought, let's not waste it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're in a good mood... Just because you witnessed that strange deal happen?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Zaaro, how long have we been here in Nuova Volsinii?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: More than two months.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: And how many places have we been, in that span of time? How many customers have we ferried?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Isn't it uncomfortable, seeing everyone in the city act so prim and proper?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The city hall staff and court judges are itching to slap their laws on their foreheads, ready to fight against Siracusa's old customs and rules at any moment...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: While the famiglie are trying their best to prove how much they like and have adapted to this new set of game rules.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I've never seen Siracusans this restrained, this uncomfortable, like everyone has a mask sewn onto their faces.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It'll be Carnevale soon. Are they even in the mood to enjoy the so-called 'carnival'?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm thankful for our two friends here worrying over their citizen points for showing me Siracusa remains the same, and it's in every Siracusan's nature to turn every new territory into a swamp.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Haha, now I'm looking forward to Carnevale.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hey, are you even listening?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I smelled their scent.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Your compatriots, the other Signori dei Lupi?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No plans to catch up with them?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: A Signore dei Lupi who has left the game should no longer interfere.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Don't look so defeated, Zaaro. You did lose, but it doesn't mean you can't derive any more fun from it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Think about it, what else can you do?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Free yourself. We returned to this swamp for a leisurely swim.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: And you? When are you planning to say hello to your past?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Carissimo padre mio, you mean?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I already said addio... though I did prepare a gift for him this time.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The cab driver stops talking, and lifts her legs onto the dashboard to rest in a more comfortable position.

Through the car window ahead is a wall sporting a huge billboard advertising a winery. A sullen-looking man with his tightly-knit brows brandishes a wine glass towards the camera, with the following invitation—
'Saluzzo Vino is looking for a senior legal advisor! Several other positions also open, apply to join us today!'
Don Alberto, we got all the information here. Please have a look.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: We have a total of thirteen wineries in this city. Six of them are undergoing a qualification audit and cannot operate for the time being.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: Two of them on the city's outer plates are about to welcome their first harvest, and the warehouse, lab, and bottling line are ready...
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: But there's no way we can handle this many ripened grapes in this short period of time with half our wineries not operating.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: The root of our problem lies with city hall's attitude towards us, those stronzi are obviously targeting us on purpose—
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: These files are meant for our friend here. He has the means of solving such problems.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Alberto looks across the table, where a red-headed Lupo has been sitting for a while.
The wine is finally decanted, and he takes a sip, calmly returning Alberto's gaze.
Merge and restructure all Saluzzo properties in this city into new entities, including both the operating ones and those undergoing an audit...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Then, hire non-stakeholder employees to manage on-site operations. This is feasible under the New Urban Management Act.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Simply put, I will transfer these properties to you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Famiglia Bellone does not have large-scale businesses, so the procedure should be relatively simple. Yet you've been rejected more than ten times now.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Whenever it involves a 'Bellone' or 'Saluzzo', the government and court—or should I say, Leontuzzo and Lavinia—always tend to react in a more defensive manner.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It sounds like I have no reason to refuse this arrangement.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri, what I value more is that you understand Leontuzzo better than anyone else, as well as the rules he has set—
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You are the best fit for this position.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I want to see if city hall will still brazenly clamp down on us even after we tie our companies together in total compliance with the New Urban Management Act.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Don't you agree, our new Don Bellone?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Don't treat me like your puppet, Alberto.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I admit Bellone's company registration has met many bumps on the road, and your invitation was timely.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You get rid of some troubles, while I gain the rights to legally enter the city. We're just business partners getting what we want.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Even though the Bellones are not what they used to be in Siracusa anymore; even though this new city doesn't have famiglie anymore, you need to know this—
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: My choice to work for Saluzzo Vino does not in any way mean the Bellones will be at the Saluzzos' beck and call.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So you'd best put that title to rest. I'm not sitting here as the don of Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: There's no point in acting tough, ragazzo.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Whether or not this collaboration will mean 'The Bellones have thrown themselves at the Saluzzos'—I'm curious how Leontuzzo will see it.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Oh, almost forgot. Maybe he doesn't even care at all anymore.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: He already abandoned you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: If you insist on this topic... Aren't you a lone wolf too, Alberto?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The White Wolf of Saluzzo—your daughter—who always disobeyed your orders, has left her famiglia forever.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: According to my sources, she arrived in Nuova Volsinii a few months ago... as a cab driver.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm curious, too. Did she come here to add insult to your injury, or will she return home and help the Saluzzos?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...Lappland?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I banished her.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: From what I know about her, she's probably thinking that's not how it went down.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I won't take offense from you, Demetri, you are different from Bernardo, you understand what's going on.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: These harmless differences will not affect our shared interests, so why not take this as a happy start to our collaboration?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Fine, I won't waste my breath then.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Why not you sign this equity document first, Signor Alberto.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'll use the dividends from this month to get Leon to reminisce about the good old days.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Went looking for your fellow floating heads?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I did. A hypocritical and sly wolf.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Caesar has turned her Fang into an idiot who only knows how to bite people and suck blood. She won't be able to find Vargo's Fang even if she sniffed every single corner of this land.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: That Fang has never showed himself. Hidden very well.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: But if we had Bernardo here, locating a Siracusan in Siracusa would be like going through a pile of hay for an animal. Simple.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: If I don't interfere and help them out, god knows how long they're going to drag this round for!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Zaaro, it's rare to see so many words spill out from your mouth.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're upsetting the table, and relishing it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Like you are.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Esatto. Stop worrying about winning or losing, learn to do it for the love of the game, and derive even more enjoyment from it. That's what games are really for.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: How do you wolves fail to even understand this...?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii nights are dark.
Woman and wolf stand atop a building, sandwiched by the night sky above and the noisy city below—
Pre-Carnevale activities happen in all sorts of shades and forms, vehicles speed through the streets, pedestrians shuttle to and fro. They enjoy a panoramic view of everything happening below.
They cover their fangs with masks, and use a festival to divulge their thirst to have it all. How sad.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: On the contrary, you seem to be enjoying this farce. When did you become so interested in such boring activities?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Zitto, Zaaro. You're noisier than the people who used to hang around me before.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm just enjoying the breeze.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We practically have a VIP seat here. So keep quiet and wait for the show to begin.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The actors are already on the stage...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're late, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm sorry, it's been a really busy day.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Still working on your inaugural speech?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Well, that too... We're planning a birthday party for an entire city. It's not quite the same as planning a party at home, is it?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm surprised... you still remember.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Of course I do. Did you think I was going to forget how you bought ginger ale instead of beer for the banquet, and pocketed the difference to buy a car?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Well, I guess that DID happen.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You sound... distracted, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Do I? It's nothing. I guess it's been too long since we last saw each other.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Take care on your way, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Might have taken that as a threat, if we weren't in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Enough joking and hurry up. I'm waiting at the seat by the window.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The car drives by the apprentice tailor jogging on the street and heads to the end of the main street.
I should pick up the pace. I can't miss the delivery window to hand over the clothes to Signor Alberto.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: The Don of Famiglia Saluzzo...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: What kind of man is he?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Luchino gasps for breath with the suit in his arms as he runs through a deserted alley, illuminated only by the light coming from a cafe.
That's the fifth slice of pizza and third glass of juice that you just eliminated. Are you that hungry?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Shut up and drink this espresso.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It's so damn sour!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: If we screw up this mission because this swill makes me throw up, whose head am I gonna give the boss, yours?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Live with it. I just picked it up off the shelf.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Nobody uses this frontage road anyway. Besides, it's just transporting a bunch of 'tires', what could go wrong?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: No need to get all worked up about an unimportant job like this.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm tired of listening to your complaints for the past two months, Gambino.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Haven't you figured out our new boss yet? Trying too hard to show off in front of him will only have the opposite effect.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Fresh meat like us, we gotta be patient and wait for our chance.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Well, ain't you the model employee, Capone.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I thought you would at least show a little bit of, I don't know, shame? There's hardly any place for a Sicilian in Siracusa these days.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm not Sicilian anymore. It's your shame, not mine.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I just want to get my Nuova Volsinii citizenship sooner rather than later. All the work I put in over the past six months, all the guarantee money I paid, and I'm only halfway to the required points—
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Halfway?! You've got fifty more points than I do? Have you been doing—*gasp*—community service while I wasn't looking?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Shut your crap, Gambino. We're on our last chance and you know it.
attributes.name: Capone
Capone
attributes.content: Keep your eyes sharp on the street. It should be coming any time now—

attributes.name: Capone
attributes.content: You got any pizza left? Give me one.
Cazzo, it's cold, how do you even manage to eat this...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: As the two grumble to the other, a dark shadow quietly slips through the alley.
*sniff*
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: This is the smell. True wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: A truck drives past Red and attracts her attention.
Are you hiding inside?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: *sniff*
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: No. Hm, over there?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: She looks toward the opposite end of the street.
Grandma, I am a wolf hunter. I remember.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The girls?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Vargo, I hope you left me accurate instructions on how to identify them.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: *sigh*... It'll be a headache if I hurt the wrong people.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: With blade in hand, the Vulpo leans on a wall hidden within its shadow, waiting in silence for the prime opportunity to strike.
She will eliminate the two targets who threaten Umberto's life in one go, and then demand her reward from the wolf.
Tsk. A kid loitering around the streets outside this late?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: (That figure... was I just seeing things?)
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Lyudmila, Lyudmila... why did you space out so suddenly?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: It's nothing... Just a little tired.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You'd better get off and wait at that intersection coming up. We're about to arrive, and there'll be trouble with the Venezias if I show up with a rando in tow.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Lyudmila...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Enough. I got on your truck, so I'll stick with you all the way.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Thanks, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: No matter what happens, I'm lucky to have you with me.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Hmmhmm♪ Hmmhmmhmm♪ Hmm♪
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You've been listening to this song on loop for a while now. Not tired of it?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: 'A Chance Encounter' is an amazing song, and Sora's got one hell of a singing voice!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: It's the hottest new single this week. There was an interview saying she recorded it just for Carnevale.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Sommer hums to the song looping from the speakers.
Soon, the truck will reach the turning point ahead and bump into the other car.
Carnevale's curtains are slowly pulled open.

In just one city block, we have our young and promising Acting Mayor, Fangs, people coming home for the festivities, and Sicilians too—I don't even know who they're seeking protection from...what a crowd.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I could make it even noisier.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Just wait, Zaaro. You don't have to do anything.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Pretend you're a cab driver who turns on the radio at the right time to tune into a story.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The games humanity plays are much more interesting than your kind's preference to select just a few people to fight each other.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Caesar's pup has discovered Agnese's cub.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Look! Isn't there another car coming from the port?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: —'Bang!'
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The truck crashes into the car, and flees in a panic. Eye-watering flames, hysterical crowds.
Those who share the same stage, obviously perform the same play.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Just a chaotic show. I don't see what's so fun about this, Lappland.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: What's with the rush?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Before the play truly begins, allow me to perform my duty as an upstanding citizen of the city.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Pronto. Buonasera, is this the police?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Me? Just a driver-for-hire. I'd like to make a report.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Si... the port district. That's right, an accident just happened.
attributes.name: Lappland
